Articles.Content:
Look! I have a YouTube channel!

Im planning to do (mostly) livestreams on my new YouTube channel, since i prefer to interact with the audience. I don't have the best English accent however, so keep that in mind when im talking through the mic, i don't speak English very often.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiMCQjFhx8VRnZSzOm7YhYw

Im currently focusing on designing and streaming a satellite kind of thing in Sketchup, and im also going to try out Aerobraking around Mars in Realism Overhaul.

Edited February 13, 2018 by NSEP
All the best for it! It's not particulary easy to start a channell and to attract the viewers, but if you have the good sauce with a nice menu, it should go well. I will follow the updates for sure.

Im live! I don't have the mic yet though.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qbwYbTiSSo4

Stream crashed because my computer also crashed.

ill have a look at it later.

I tried to do a 1+ hour stream to do see if my fix for the PC crash works. It finally works without exploding the computer! Thats a good sign!

https://youtu.be/IGlOgwCjoJY

The Mars Aerobrake test should follow up next.

There is going to be somewhat of a language barrier between the forum users and my personal friends, i have noticed.

1 hour ago, NSEP said:

There is going to be somewhat of a language barrier between the forum users and my personal friends, i have noticed.

Dutch vs Engels?

Hmm.... could be interesting to see it play out.

Also, cool little plane from the stream. Like the false intake like thing.
Okay here goes nothing, my first narrated video!

My new series, where i will explain the history, future and basics of spaceflight. The second season will be about space itself.

Subtitles will come soon.

Edited March 27, 2018 by NSEP
